WeLoveServers VPS hosting allows you to leverage the power of a dedicated server at a fraction of the cost. We utilize Intel Xeon Hexa Core processors with hardware RAID10, we don't cut corners when it comes to hardware. That's why you'll find that we use enterprise class server hardware only, we never have and never will use desktop-grade hardware!

We have great deals going on for Linux VPS's powered by OpenVZ or KVM, in addition with Windows VPS plans!

KVM Linux VPS Deals

Did you know that WeLoveServers is now offering KVM VPS? WeLoveServers KVM VPS hosting allows you to run just any operating system as a virtual machine for significantly less than the cost of a full dedicated server. Think of a KVM as a "semi-dedicated server." The beauty of KVM virtualization is that it allocates dedicated and secure isolated resources for every virtual machine. That means all resources are reserved for your server - all resources are guaranteed!

Specifications of our VPS's:
  • Servers are powered by hardware RAID10 to ensure redundancy and high performance. All backed with robust infrastructure and a premium multi-homed network.
